title: Juventus appoint Luciano Spalletti as manager until end of season - BBC Sport
snippet: 30 October 2025 · Juventus have appointed former Italy head coach Luciano Spalletti as their manager until the end of the season. The 66-year-old replaces Igor Tudor, who was sacked after the Serie A side's defeat by Lazio on Sunday.

title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season.

title: Comolli confirms Tudor will be Juventus’ manager for the 2025-26 season | Black & White & Read All Over
snippet: The biggest one, though, was for the immediate future and what Igor Tudor’s status for the 2025-26 season was going to be. We didn’t have to wait long to get an answer. Comolli was quick to confirm Tudor — who took over for Thiago Motta ...

title: Juventus appoint Luciano Spalletti as new head coach - The Athletic
snippet: Oct. 29, 2025Updated Oct. 30, 2025 ... Juventus have appointed Luciano Spalletti as their new head coach.

title: Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti - Juventus
snippet: 30 October 2025 · SHARE · Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti · Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti · Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti · Luciano Spalletti is the new head coach of Juventus, signing an agreement with the Club until June 30, 2026.
